price: - wer aber darüber hinaus (etwas) begehrt, das sind die Übertreter-,
arabic: فَمَنِ ٱبۡتَغَىٰ وَرَآءَ ذَٰلِكَ فَأُوْلَٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلۡعَادُونَ

version.title: German Translation - Bubenheim
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into German by Abdullah As-Samit (Frank Bubenheim) and Dr. Nadeem Elyas

meta.transliteration: famani ib'taghā warāa dhālika fa-ulāika humu al-ʿādūna
